data.name: Crazy Cook
data.detailed_description:
Crazy Cook is a fun and crazy cooking game for the whole family ! Your goal is to create great recipes…with a twist : the ingredients are a bit hostile !
You will have to cut, shoot, smash them. It is a very good exercice if you want to get fit !

Are you ready to slice flying pigs with a huge knife ? (workshop 1)
Peel or block smiling oignons with a peeler ? (workshop 2)
Smash crazy tomatoes with a hammer ? (workshop 3)
Shoot jumping chickens with a salt mill ?(workshop 4)

10 recipes with 4 workshops each are included : that's 40 ways to have crazy fun !

Crazy Cook is in early acces. It's only the beginning !
We will soon add 2 new workshops (Pistol shooting and baking). We'll also add new features, new songs, new recipes and new tools ! Stay tuned.

Thank you for purchasing the game in early acces. It means the world !

data.short_description: You have to peel, cut, shoot and smash crazy ingredients ! It is a very good exercice if you want to get fit. Crazy Cook is a fun and crazy cooking game for the whole family ! Your goal is to create great recipes…with a twist : the ingredients are a bit hostile !
data.reviews:
“It's a lot of fun, I like the feel of it, the look, it plays very well !”
VR Reviews

“Fruit Ninja gets a chef's job, now chopping with a purpose”
Midlife Game-ist VR

“It looks really cool, the graphics are cool, the environments are quite good”
WelshGamerVR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 95/98/ME/2000/XP
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound Compatible/Support 3D Sound Effects
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480 or greater
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound Compatible/Support 3D Sound Effects
